functions.name: make_error_code
functions.description: Creates an error_code object for a given error condition from a specific category.

functions.name: make_error_condition
functions.description: Creates an error_condition object for a given error condition from a specific category.

classes.name: error_code
classes.description: Represents an error code, which is a platform-specific error value.

functions.name: default_error_condition
functions.description: Returns the default error condition object associated with the error code.

functions.name: message
functions.description: Returns a string representation of the error code.

functions.name: category
functions.description: Returns a reference to the error category associated with the error code.

classes.name: error_condition
classes.description: Represents a portable error condition, which is an error value from a platform-independent enumeration.

functions.name: default_error_condition
functions.description: Returns the default error condition object associated with the error condition.

functions.name: message
functions.description: Returns a string representation of the error condition.

functions.name: category
functions.description: Returns a reference to the error category associated with the error condition.

classes.name: error_category
classes.description: Defines the interface for error category objects.

functions.name: default_error_condition
functions.description: Returns the default error condition object associated with the error category.

functions.name: equivalent
functions.description: Checks if two error codes or error conditions are equivalent.

functions.name: message
functions.description: Returns the error message associated with a specific error code or error condition.
